Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try {  	DefaultApplicationContext context = new DefaultApplicationContext ();  	DefaultAssemblyFactory objFactory = new DefaultAssemblyFactory ();  	context.ObjectFactory = objFactory;  	DefaultObjects.ApplicationContext = context;  	/// 加载库文件  	AssemblyLoader.ExecuteLoadLibFiles (".\\plugins\\*.dll"' objFactory);  	/// 加载对象的配置文件  	int j = XMLoader.LoadFormXmlFiles ("Config\\MyBean_*.xml"' context);  	Debug.WriteLine ("文件中对象定义个数:{0}"' j);  	int a = 1;  	int b = 100;  	/// 根据配置创建对象，执行动作  	int r = (DefaultObjects.ApplicationContext.GetObject ("childPlugin") as ICalculator).Add (a' b);  	Console.WriteLine ("计算{0} + {1}结果为:{2}"' a' b' r);  }  catch (Exception e) {  	Console.Write (e.Message);  }
